allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
add blast 2 link, fix bookshop url, glitch effect + excerpt shuffler

- add blast 2 magazine \(co-edited by sean\) to homepage links
- fix broken bookshop.org url \(old format deprecated\)
- add glitch text effect on header name hover
- add clickable excerpt shuffler with multiple fuccboi quotes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
add podcast page, contact form, influences, rss feed, 404

- /podcast: youtube integration with episode thumbnails
- /contact: form with inquiry type dropdown \(formspree\)
- /influences: detailed breakdown of literary/philosophical influences
- /api/feed: rss feed endpoint proxying substack
- improved 404 with glitch effect and fuccboi quote
- skeleton loading states for journal + podcast
- add rss link to footer, influences link to about

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
